title: Ethiopia: NBE Re-Licenses Standard Bank Representative Office Under New Banking Proclamation
description:
The National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) has formally re-licensed the Representative Office of Standard Bank, marking the first such approval issued under the country’s newly revised Banking Business Proclamation.

title: Ethiopia Adopts ‘Digital Ethiopia 2030’ to Guide Five-Year Digital Transformation

title: Ethiopia: Ethio Telecom Unveils Third Super-Fast EV Charging Station in Addis Ababa
description:
Ethio Telecom has inaugurated its third super fast electric vehicle (EV) charging station in Addis Ababa. The new facility, which was opened yesterday in the Summit Fiyel Bet area, features 16 high capacity super fast chargers and is set to boost the city’s EV charging network.

title: Interest rates will have a mild upward bias because growth is strong, along with inflation: SBI Mutual Fund
description: SBI Mutual Fund, India’s largest mutual funds by assets under management (AUM) of around Rs 8 lakh crore ($97 billion), has a model that, at the moment, is positive on fixed income and negative on equities. title: Ethiopia plans strategic mission for India to drive its pharmaceutical manufacturing growth
description:
Ethiopian Government is planning a strategic mission for India to gather actionable lessons and initiate partnerships that will drive Ethiopia’s pharmaceutical manufacturing growth, according to official sources.
